title: Apex Launcher Pro 3.0.2 build 3021 + Apex Notifier 3.2.0
description:
Apex Launcher Pro - Launcher for Android, which will surprise you with really pleasant, fully customizable interface smoothly.

Features:
Folder in the Applications menu (starting with version 2.0.0)
The choice of number of desktops and customizable grid
Circular, elastic scrolling (+ desktop application menu)
Effects scroll (desktop + application menu)
Customizable scrolling LED (desktop + application menu)
Management gestures (swipe, etc.) On / Off background transparency in the application menu
On / Off change screen orientation
On / Off Scroll Wallpaper
On / Off Google-bar
On / Off status bar
On / Off display the names of applications (desktop + application menu)
Lock your desktop (by adding new and old objects move as in GO Launcher EX)
All / Downloaded / Widgets tabs in the application menu
Sort application (name, date of installation, usage)
Add widgets from the application menu (must be installed as a system) or with a dialogue on the desktop
Resize all widgets
Customizable dock (scrolling and gestures)
Editing icons
Hide icons in the application menu
Optimized for phones and tablets
Improved support for folders (unlimited number of icons, batch add, etc.)
Save / Restore Settings
Many settings customization

Differences PRO-version:
Folder in the Applications menu
Notification of new events (in the dock)
Gestures Management dock
Two-finger gestures
More Effects spins
Batch add applications folder
Option merge folders
Widgets in the dock (1x1 only)
Overlapping widgets
Changes in version 3.0.2 build 3021:
Feeling Lucky: random app recommendations
Updated Lollipop style scrolling indicator
Tweaks and fixes for Nexus 9
Fixed bug with circle drawer and folder animations
Fixed app animation bug on Lollipop
Fixed a bug with usage reporting
Updated translations
